course.subject: PPOL
course.name: Special Topics in Public Policy: Health and Education Policy Evaluation
course.description: This course has two objectives: 1) To explore how Economics can be used to understand health in the developing countries settings, and 2) to provide tools and skills to evaluate program and policy in this field. It will start with a review of economic tools to evaluate impacts of programs and policies: micro econometrics including OLS, IV approach, diff-in-diff estimation, and regression discontinuity design. Rest of the course will focus on recent empirical papers in health economics.
